message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable.  Could you do $11,000?  I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment.
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
